mapper.select: SELECT R_T.R_NO, U_T.U_NO , R_T.RANK, U_T.NICKNAME AS REVIEWER, U_T.IMG AS REVIEWER_IMG, R_T.CONTENT AS REVIEW_CONTENT, R_T.REG_DT AS REVIEW_REG_DT FROM REVIEW R_T, USERS U_T, LECTURE L_T WHERE R_T.L_NO = L_T.L_NO AND R_T.L_NO = (SELECT L_NO FROM LECTURE WHERE TITLE = #{lecture_title}) AND R_T.U_NO = U_T.U_NO ORDER BY R_T.R_NO DESC
